description: Simulate tier cost changes â€” adjust daily allowances per tier, and optionally simulate tier reassignment from scoring_snapshot with per-tier downgrade locks.

panels.description: Total actual tier-subsidized cost in the selected time range.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(start_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY) as time,
  SUM(total_price) as actual_cost
FROM generation_event
WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
  AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  AND is_billed_usage = true
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Actual Tier Cost

panels.description: Simulated tier cost if daily allowances were set to the values above. Per-user per-day spend is capped at the simulated allowance.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  day AS time,
  SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
    CASE tier
      WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
      WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
      WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
      WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
      WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
      ELSE 0
    END
  )) AS simulated_cost
FROM user_day
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Simulated Tier Cost

panels.description: Total savings: actual cost minus simulated cost. Positive value = money saved by lowering tier allowances.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  round(SUM(actual_spend) - SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
    CASE tier
      WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
      WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
      WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
      WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
      WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
      ELSE 0
    END
  )), 2) AS savings
FROM user_day

panels.title: Total Savings

panels.description: Percentage of tier cost that would be saved with the simulated allowances.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  round(
    (SUM(actual_spend) - SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
      CASE tier
        WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
        WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
        WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
        WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
        WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
        ELSE 0
      END
    ))) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(actual_spend), 0),
    1
  ) AS savings_pct
FROM user_day

panels.title: Savings %

panels.description: Breakdown per tier: actual vs simulated cost, savings, and how many user-day instances would be capped. Users_Capped counts user-day pairs where actual spend exceeded the simulated cap.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  tier AS Tier,
  CASE tier
    WHEN 'microbe' THEN 0.1
    WHEN 'spore'   THEN 1
    WHEN 'seed'    THEN 3
    WHEN 'flower'  THEN 10
    WHEN 'nectar'  THEN 20
    ELSE 0
  END AS Current_Allowance,
  CASE tier
    WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
    WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
    WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
    WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
    WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
    ELSE 0
  END AS Simulated_Allowance,
  round(SUM(actual_spend), 2) AS Actual_Cost,
  round(SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
    CASE tier
      WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
      WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
      WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
      WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
      WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
      ELSE 0
    END
  )), 2) AS Simulated_Cost,
  round(SUM(actual_spend) - SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
    CASE tier
      WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
      WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
      WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
      WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
      WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
      ELSE 0
    END
  )), 2) AS Savings,
  round(
    (SUM(actual_spend) - SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
      CASE tier
        WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
        WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
        WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
        WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
        WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
        ELSE 0
      END
    ))) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(actual_spend), 0),
    1
  ) AS Savings_Pct,
  countIf(actual_spend > CASE tier
    WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
    WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
    WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
    WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
    WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
    ELSE 0
  END) AS Users_Capped
FROM user_day
GROUP BY tier
ORDER BY
  CASE tier
    WHEN 'nectar'  THEN 1
    WHEN 'flower'  THEN 2
    WHEN 'seed'    THEN 3
    WHEN 'spore'   THEN 4
    WHEN 'microbe' THEN 5
    ELSE 6
  END

panels.title: Per-Tier Comparison

panels.description: Daily tier cost: actual (red) vs simulated (green). The gap between the lines is the daily savings from lowering tier allowances.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  day AS time,
  round(SUM(actual_spend), 2) AS actual_daily_cost,
  round(SUM(LEAST(actual_spend,
    CASE tier
      WHEN 'microbe' THEN ${sim_microbe}
      WHEN 'spore'   THEN ${sim_spore}
      WHEN 'seed'    THEN ${sim_seed}
      WHEN 'flower'  THEN ${sim_flower}
      WHEN 'nectar'  THEN ${sim_nectar}
      ELSE 0
    END
  )), 2) AS simulated_daily_cost
FROM user_day
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Actual vs Simulated Daily Cost

panels.description: Simulated daily cost broken down by tier. Each bar segment shows how much each tier would cost under the simulated allowances.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  day AS time,
  round(sumIf(LEAST(actual_spend, ${sim_microbe}), tier = 'microbe'), 2) AS microbe,
  round(sumIf(LEAST(actual_spend, ${sim_spore}), tier = 'spore'), 2) AS spore,
  round(sumIf(LEAST(actual_spend, ${sim_seed}), tier = 'seed'), 2) AS seed,
  round(sumIf(LEAST(actual_spend, ${sim_flower}), tier = 'flower'), 2) AS flower,
  round(sumIf(LEAST(actual_spend, ${sim_nectar}), tier = 'nectar'), 2) AS nectar
FROM user_day
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Simulated Daily Cost by Tier

panels.description: Number of users per day per tier whose actual spend exceeded the simulated cap. These are the users who would be affected by the tier change.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
raw_user_day AS (
  SELECT
    toDate(start_time) AS day,
    user_github_username AS user,
    user_tier AS original_tier,
    ls.scored_tier AS scored_tier,
    SUM(total_price) AS actual_spend
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY day, user, original_tier, scored_tier
),
user_day AS (
  SELECT day, user, actual_spend,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS tier
  FROM raw_user_day
)
SELECT
  day AS time,
  countIf(tier = 'microbe' AND actual_spend > ${sim_microbe}) AS microbe,
  countIf(tier = 'spore' AND actual_spend > ${sim_spore}) AS spore,
  countIf(tier = 'seed' AND actual_spend > ${sim_seed}) AS seed,
  countIf(tier = 'flower' AND actual_spend > ${sim_flower}) AS flower,
  countIf(tier = 'nectar' AND actual_spend > ${sim_nectar}) AS nectar
FROM user_day
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Users Capped Per Day by Tier

panels.description: Number of distinct users whose effective tier differs from their current tier under the downgrade simulation. Only active when Downgrade Sim = on.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
users AS (
  SELECT
    user_github_username AS user,
    argMax(user_tier, start_time) AS original_tier,
    any(ls.scored_tier) AS scored_tier
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY user
),
reassigned AS (
  SELECT user, original_tier,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS effective_tier
  FROM users
)
SELECT countIf(effective_tier != original_tier) AS users_reassigned
FROM reassigned

panels.title: Users Reassigned

panels.description: Migration table: shows how many users move from one tier to another under the downgrade simulation.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_scoring AS (
  SELECT github_username, argMax(computed_tier, timestamp) AS scored_tier
  FROM scoring_snapshot
  GROUP BY github_username
),
users AS (
  SELECT
    user_github_username AS user,
    argMax(user_tier, start_time) AS original_tier,
    any(ls.scored_tier) AS scored_tier
  FROM generation_event ge
  LEFT JOIN latest_scoring ls ON ge.user_github_username = ls.github_username
  WHERE start_time >= $__fromTime AND start_time < $__toTime
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_tier IN ('microbe', 'spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
  GROUP BY user
),
reassigned AS (
  SELECT user, original_tier,
    CASE
      WHEN '${sim_downgrade}' = 'off' THEN original_tier
      WHEN scored_tier IS NULL OR scored_tier = '' THEN original_tier
      WHEN multiIf(scored_tier='nectar',5, scored_tier='flower',4, scored_tier='seed',3, scored_tier='spore',2, 1)
         > multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1)
        THEN scored_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'nectar' AND '${lock_nectar}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'flower' AND '${lock_flower}' = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'seed'   AND '${lock_seed}'   = 'on' THEN original_tier
      WHEN original_tier = 'spore'  AND '${lock_spore}'  = 'on' THEN original_tier
      ELSE scored_tier
    END AS effective_tier
  FROM users
)
SELECT
  original_tier AS "From",
  effective_tier AS "To",
  count() AS Users
FROM reassigned
WHERE effective_tier != original_tier
GROUP BY original_tier, effective_tier
ORDER BY
  multiIf(original_tier='nectar',5, original_tier='flower',4, original_tier='seed',3, original_tier='spore',2, 1) DESC,
  multiIf(effective_tier='nectar',5, effective_tier='flower',4, effective_tier='seed',3, effective_tier='spore',2, 1) DESC

panels.title: Tier Migration

list.description: Simulated daily allowance for Microbe tier (current: $0.10)

list.description: Simulated daily allowance for Spore tier (current: $1)
list.label: Spore Cap

list.description: Simulated daily allowance for Seed tier (current: $3)
list.label: Seed Cap

list.description: Simulated daily allowance for Flower tier (current: $10)

list.description: Enable tier reassignment from scoring_snapshot. When ON, users may be upgraded/downgraded based on computed scores.
list.label: Downgrade Sim
list.name: sim_downgrade

list.label: Lock Nectar
list.name: lock_nectar

list.description: When ON, flower users cannot be downgraded (lock their tier).
list.label: Lock Flower
list.name: lock_flower

list.description: When ON, seed users cannot be downgraded (lock their tier).
